title: Gas and Oil Mix Calculator
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Small Engine Maintenance
description: Interactive MicroSim to calculate two-cycle oil needed based on gas amount and mix ratio.

learningObjectives: Calculate oil volume needed for a given gas amount and mix ratio
Convert the oil requirement into practical measurement units

keyQuestions: How does oil required change as gas amount increases?
What happens to oil needed when the ratio shifts from 50:1 to 40:1?
commonMisconceptions: Confusing gas:oil ratios with oil:gas ratios
Assuming oil amount scales linearly without considering the ratio
assessmentOpportunities: Compute oil needed for three gas volumes using the default ratio
Explain why a lower ratio increases required oil
